required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evalution the Safety and Efficacy in Atopic Dermatitis Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open, Long-term Follow-up Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of FURESTEM-AD Inj. in Patients With Moderate to Severe Chronic Atopic Dermatitis: 5-year Results From the K0102 Extension Study

brief_summary.textblock: A multi-center, open, long-term follow-up study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of FURESTEM-AD inj. in patients with moderate to severe chronic atopic dermatitis: 5-year results from the K0102 extension study

primary_outcome.measure: Safety Assessment (Rate of Adverse Event, Number of Participants with Adverse Event)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects whose Eczema Area and Severity Index (EASI) was decreased from baseline by more than 50% at Week 12 (EASI-50)
Percentage of subjects whose Eczema Area and Severity Index (EASI) was decreased from baseline by more than 75% at Week 12 (EASI-75)
Rate of change in EASI from baseline
Percentage of subjects whose Investigator's Global Assessment (IGA) score at each visit is 0 or 1
Percentage of subjects whose IGA at each visit is 0 or 1, or improved to 2 or higher
Percentage of subjects whose SCORing Atopic Dermatitis (SCORAD) INDEX was decreased from baseline by more than 50% at each visit (SCORAD-50)
Rate of change in SCORAD index from baseline at each visit
Change in SCORAD index from baseline at each visit
secondary_outcome.description: SCORAD index range is from 0 (clear) to 103 (severe)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of change in Body Surface Area(BSA) of the lesion from baseline
Change in Body Surface Area(BSA) of the lesion from baseline
Change in total serum Immunoglobulin E(IgE) from baseline

study_pop.textblock: moderate to severe chronic atopic dermatitis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Subject who enrolled K0102 Clinical Trial(parent study).
2. Subjects who understand and voluntarily sign an informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
1. In case follow-up is not possible from end of K0102 clinical trial to end of this study period
2. Any other condition which the investigator judges would make patient unsuitable for study participation

facility.name: The Catholic University of Korea, Seoul ST. Mary's Hospital
